name: Wizard Names
description:
I made this as part of my intended submission for 7DRL Challenge 2021. I had originally planned to make a roguelike dungeon crawler, but I wasn't able to get it to a satisfactory level of completeness by the end of the jam period. Rather than submitting a half-finished game, I thought I would at least upload a standalone related project that I've been working on as part of that game.

This is a small web app that generates random wizard names from a list of funny words I've been assembling in the background while working on the main game. I had been thinking of random name generation systems for a while for a different project, but a roguelike seemed like the perfect place to implement random character name generation. Plus, it gave me a chance to combine some of my greatest loves: game design, D&D flavor, and spending an unconscionable amount of time writing a program to generate dumb words for my own amusement.
